name: The Tale of Alticia
description:
A brief adventure in which a young orc forced to serve as a slave under an oppressive human master must break out of a human-run prison after being assumed to be responsible for his master's assassination. Designed as a creative way to raise awareness of and response against racism within the gaming community. Probably more appropriately identified as a demo of sorts.

Download the www.zip file, open it, then launch the .html file in the folder titled "index". 

If the game doesn't launch , try opening the .html with Firefox or Microsoft Edge by right-clicking the file using "Open with". If it still doesn't work, try right clicking the www.zip folder extracting it and then launching the .html.

The senior-year project of four high school English students. 

Created with RPG Maker MV
